movies.name: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman faces the Joker in Gotham City.

movies.name: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Furiosa to flee from a warlord.

movies.name: John Wick
movies.description: A retired hitman seeks vengeance for the killing of his dog.

movies.name: Die Hard
movies.description: John McClane takes on terrorists in a Los Angeles skyscraper.

movies.name: Gladiator
movies.description: A Roman general seeks revenge against the emperor who murdered his family.

movies.name: The Hangover
movies.description: Three friends wake up from a bachelor party with no memory of the night before.

movies.name: Superbad
movies.description: Two high school friends try to score alcohol for a party and impress their crushes.

movies.name: Anchorman
movies.description: Ron Burgundy is the top-rated newsman in San Diego in the 1970s.

movies.name: Step Brothers
movies.description: Two middle-aged men become stepbrothers and struggle to live together.

movies.name: Zombieland
movies.description: A college student teams up with three strangers to survive a zombie apocalypse.

movies.name: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of a crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his son.

movies.name: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and others intertwine in Los Angeles.

movies.name: Scarface
movies.description: In Miami, a Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel.

movies.name: Goodfellas
movies.description: The rise and fall of a mob associate over three decades.

movies.name: The Departed
movies.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police try to identify each other.

movies.name: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years.

movies.name: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The life story of a man with a low IQ who accomplishes great things.

movies.name: Fight Club
movies.description: A disillusioned man forms an underground fight club.

movies.name: The Pursuit of Happyness
movies.description: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he faces financial challenges.

movies.name: A Beautiful Mind
movies.description: The story of John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician.

movies.name: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
movies.description: Indiana Jones goes on a quest to find the Holy Grail.

movies.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A hobbit embarks on a quest to destroy a powerful ring.

movies.name: Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl
movies.description: A blacksmith teams up with a pirate to rescue the governor's daughter.

movies.name: Jurassic Park
movies.description: A group of people try to survive a dinosaur theme park gone wrong.

movies.name: Jumanji
movies.description: Two kids find and play a magical board game, releasing a man trapped in it.

movies.name: The Exorcist
movies.description: A mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter from demonic possession.

movies.name: Get Out
movies.description: A young African-American man uncovers disturbing secrets when visiting his white girlfriend's family.

movies.name: The Shining
movies.description: A man takes a job as a winter caretaker in a secluded hotel and slowly goes mad.

movies.name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
movies.description: A group of teenagers is terrorized by a killer who can attack them in their dreams.

movies.name: The Conjuring
movies.description: Paranormal investigators help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.
